title: Iban's staff

properties.name: description
properties.value: Iban's staff is a staff used to cast Iban Blast. It is obtained by defeating the evil mage Lord Iban at the end of the Underground Pass quest. Iban's staff requires 50 Magic and 50 Attack to wield. Casting Iban Blast on a monster consumes one charge from the staff and casting it on another player consumes two charges. Casting other spells, like Fire Blast, does not consume any charges.

This article is about the regular Iban's staff. For the upgraded version, see Iban's upgraded staff.

Iban's staff is a staff used to cast Iban Blast. It is obtained by defeating the evil mage Lord Iban at the end of the Underground Pass quest. Iban's staff requires 50 Magic and 50 Attack to wield. Casting Iban Blast on a monster consumes one charge from the staff and casting it on another player consumes two charges. Casting other spells, like Fire Blast, does not consume any charges.

If Iban's staff is lost prior to completing Underground Pass, Disciples of Iban must be killed for a broken staff. After the quest is completed, Koftik will give a broken staff to the player at the entrance to the Underground Pass. In either case, the broken Iban's staff must be brought to the Dark Mage with 200,000 coins to repair it.

The Dark Mage will upgrade an Iban's staff to an Iban's staff (u) for 200,000 coins, which increases the charges it holds to 2,500 instead of 120 and fully charges the staff. A broken Iban's staff can also be repaired and upgraded at the same time for 400,000 coins.

The maximum hit with Iban Blast is 25, making it excellent for low-level player killing and Barrows.

If Iban's staff is lost in PvP under level 20 Wilderness, it will be dropped to the ground and can be picked back up.

Upgrading Iban's staff or wielding an Iban's staff (u) is a medium Ardougne Diary task.

As a melee weapon, the Iban staff is equivalent to a mystic staff.

Recharging[edit | edit source]

An Iban's staff or its upgraded variant can be recharged for free by using it on the well where the paladin's badges are dropped, in the Underground Pass. Players can reach the exit by teleporting to Lleyta using a teleport crystal, by travelling to fairy ring BJS with 76 Agility, or by chartering a ship to Port Tyras (after completion of Regicide). Another method is by using the Abyss to enter the Death Altar and exiting to the bottom of the Underground Pass.

The quickest way to return to the well is through the Underground Pass exit, north of Lletya. Bringing some form of antipoison is highly recommended. Upon entering the Pass, climb down the well then go over the agility obstacles before passing through the door to the north-east where you will arrive at the well. Using the staff on the well will allow players to charge it. To return to the well from West Ardougne, you will need a bow, arrow(s), a spade, a plank (can be obtained), a tinderbox, and rope(s) to go through the Underground Pass the long way.

Alternatively, players can pay the Dark Mage in West Ardougne 100,000 coins to charge the standard staff or 250,000 coins to charge the upgraded staff.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
6 August 2020
(update)

Players are notified as the weapon charges approach zero.

31 August 2017
(update | poll)

The Dark Mage of West Ardougne is offering a new service of recharging Iban staves, once you've completed Underground Pass, thus saving you from an arduous trek down the Pass itself.

21 August 2014
(update | poll)

Iban's staff can now autocast the Iban Blast spell.

24 July 2014
(update | poll)

The Dark Mage found in West Ardougne can now offer players a magical-wizardy upgrade to their Iban staff that will allow it to hold 2,500 charges.

27 September 2006
(update)

A "Check" option was added to see the number of remaining charges.

26 January –
27 June 2005
  • The item was renamed from "Staff of iban" to "Iban's staff".
  • The item's examine was changed from "A highly magical staff." to "An ancient staff, formerly the property of Iban."
  • The broken version was renamed from "Broken iban staff" to "Iban's staff".
  • The broken version's examine was changed from "The staff is unusable in this state." to "I'll need to get this repaired before I can use it."

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Every time the player equips Iban's staff, the game chat will state "You equip the staff of Iban."
  • Players can obtain multiple staves by using the drop trick when killing a Disciple of Iban to collect multiple broken Iban's staff which can all be repaired. However, all duplicate staves share the same charges.

It is obtained by defeating the evil mage [[Lord Iban]] at the end of the [[Underground Pass]] [[quest]]. Iban's staff requires 50 [[Magic]] and 50 [[Attack]] to wield. Casting [[Iban Blast]] on a [[monster]] consumes one charge from the staff and casting it on another player consumes two charges. Casting other [[spells]], like [[Fire Blast]], does not consume any charges. If Iban's staff is lost prior to completing Underground Pass, [[Disciples of Iban]] must be killed for a broken staff. After the quest is completed, [[Koftik]] will give a broken staff to the player at the entrance to the [[Underground Pass (dungeon)|Underground Pass]]. In either case, the broken Iban's staff must be brought to the [[Dark Mage]] with {{Repair cost/Iban's staff}} to repair it. The [[Dark Mage]] will upgrade an Iban's staff to an [[Iban's staff (u)]] for {{Upgrade cost/Iban's staff (u)}}, which increases the charges it holds to 2,500 instead of 120 and fully charges the staff. A broken Iban's staff can also be repaired and upgraded at the same time for {{Upgrade cost/Iban's staff (u) recharge}}. The [[maximum hit]] with Iban Blast is 25, making it excellent for low-level [[player killing]] and [[Barrows]]. If Iban's staff is lost in [[PvP]] under level 20 [[Wilderness]], it will be dropped to the ground and can be picked back up. Upgrading Iban's staff or wielding an Iban's staff (u) is a [[medium Ardougne Diary]] task. Players can reach the exit by teleporting to Lleyta using a [[teleport crystal]], by travelling to fairy ring {{Fairycode|BJS}} with 76 [[Agility]], or by [[charter ship|chartering a ship]] to [[Port Tyras]] (after completion of [[Regicide]]). Another method is by using the [[Abyss]] to enter the [[Death Altar]] and exiting to the bottom of the Underground Pass. The quickest way to return to the well is through the Underground Pass exit, north of [[Lletya]]. Bringing some form of [[antipoison]] is highly recommended. Upon entering the Pass, climb down the well then go over the agility obstacles before passing through the door to the north-east where you will arrive at the well. Using the staff on the well will allow players to charge it. To return to the well from West Ardougne, you will need a bow, arrow(s), a spade, a plank (can be obtained), a tinderbox, and rope(s) to go through the [[Underground Pass (dungeon)|Underground Pass]] the long way. Alternatively, players can pay the [[Dark Mage]] in [[West Ardougne]] {{Charging cost/Iban's staff}} to charge the standard staff or {{Charging cost/Iban's staff (u)}} to charge the upgraded staff. ==Treasure Trails== {{EmoteClueHeader}} {{EmoteClue|tier=master|emote=Dance|location=South-west corner in [[Iban's Temple]]/[[Well of Voyage]]|item1=Iban's staff|cost=0|item2=mystic robe top (dark)|item3=mystic robe bottom (dark)}} {{EmoteClueBottom}} ==Item sources== ===Broken=== {{Drop sources|Iban's staff (broken)}} ==Changes== {{Subject changes header}} {{Subject changes |date = 6 August 2020 |update = PVP Changes |change = Players are notified as the weapon charges approach zero. }} {{Subject changes |date = 31 August 2017 |update = Fossil Island Kudos Display, the Champion's Cape, and much more. |poll = Old School Content Poll 56: Quality of Life |change = The Dark Mage of West Ardougne is offering a new service of recharging Iban staves, once you've completed Underground Pass, thus saving you from an arduous trek down the Pass itself. }} {{Subject changes |date = 21 August 2014 |update = In-Game Polls & Pet Insurance |poll = Old School feature poll - Content Poll 23 |change = Iban's staff can now autocast the [[Iban Blast]] spell. }} {{Subject changes |date = 24 July 2014 |update = F2P Trial Expansion & More |poll = Old School feature poll - Content Poll 22 |change = The Dark Mage found in West Ardougne can now offer players a magical-wizardy upgrade to their Iban staff that will allow it to hold 2,500 charges. }} {{Subject changes |date = 27 September 2006 |update = Area Sounds |change = A "Check" option was added to see the number of remaining charges. }} {{Subject changes |daterange = 26 January –
